title: Museum Exhibition Design Through Arts-based Inquiry Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental concepts of arts education and introductory understanding of museum-based learning
context.additional_context: A Course for Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers to Explore Interactions Between Artworks and Everyday Objects via Online Museum Exhibition Techniques, While Investigating Integration with Language Curricula

learning_goals: Explain the educational significance of art exhibitions using everyday objects and design at least three instructional strategies linking them to language education
Develop museum learning activities applying polyphonic (multi-interpretive) exhibition techniques and present strategies to enhance learner engagement
Construct art-based inquiry learning modules based on analyzed cases of the complementary relationship between novels and museums, and improve them through peer evaluation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
